Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Lobby
public class Lobby
extends java.lang.Object
This class is a Singleton that represents the Game Lobby

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname, Connection connection)
    add nickname and connection to a map to trace players that will be part of the same game
    static Lobby getInstance()

    control if number of players in Lobby equals Lobby size

    void removePlayer​(java.lang.String nickname)
    remove a player from the Lobby
    void setServer​(Server server)  
    void setSize​(int size)
    set Lobby size and call a server method to start waiting threads
    void startGame()
    create a new game with maxGameId as id and all players in Lobby, than create a new controller, a new remote view, connect all players in Lobby to the game, subscribe remote view to all connections.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Lobby getInstance()

    • setServer

      public void setServer​(Server server)

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname, Connection connection)
      add nickname and connection to a map to trace players that will be part of the same game
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the nickname of the player
      connection - is the connection of the player

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      control if number of players in Lobby equals Lobby size
      Returns:
      true if Lobby is full, otherwise false

    • getSize

      public int getSize()

    • setSize

      public void setSize​(int size)
      set Lobby size and call a server method to start waiting threads
      Parameters:
      size -

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      create a new game with maxGameId as id and all players in Lobby, than create a new controller, a new remote view, connect all players in Lobby to the game, subscribe remote view to all connections. It also sets maxGameId as gameId to all connections and add to server currentGames map game just created. Finally increase maxGameId, overwrite it in memory and call clear method.

    • getPlayers

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPlayers()

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Returns:
      true only if Lobby' size is zero

    • nicknameAvailable

      public boolean nicknameAvailable​(java.lang.String nickname)

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(java.lang.String nickname)
      remove a player from the Lobby
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the nickname of the player that should be removed
